metadata.title: CVE-2019-19204 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Oniguruma 6.x before 6.9.4_rc2. In the function fetch_interval_quantifier (formerly known as fetch_range_quantifier) in regparse.c, PFETCH is called without checking PEND. This leads to a heap-based buffer over-read.

criterions.comment: libonig package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.9.4-1').
